## Features* Free software: MIT* Documentation: ## Enabling Python versionsInstall Python versions using `pyenv` and enable all versions to be used with `tox`:``` console$ pyenv install 3.8.10 3.9.5$ pyenv shell 3.8.10 3.9.5$ pyenv local 3.8.10```## Acknowledgements - [Cookiecutter](https://github.com/audreyr/cookiecutter) - [zillionare/cookiecutter-pypackage](https://github.com/zillionare/cookiecutter-pypackage) - [Naereen/badges](https://github.com/Naereen/badges)
